page.title: 11Julie's Weekend.
page.content: Most weekends are different for us as Dad sometimes works weekends and Mom works most weekends. Saturday is the only day we can have a lie in. I (Julie) get up about 8.00am, play with my computer, read a book or watch T.V. I sometimes take Mom and Dad a cup of tea or coffee in bed. They get up about 9.30am, then we have breakfast, most times it's cereal and toast with tea. We then go and do the shopping down in Rugeley. We come home, Mom tidies up, makes the beds and prepares dinner. Dad usually does odd jobs about the house (Which Mom has found him to do) or goes and does odd jobs on the car. I like riding my bike and calling for my friends. We go for a ride around up to Etching Hill or just around the streets. When Mom is working in the evening she goes out about 5.45pm and my Dad and myself watch T.V.
